casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Robert Amos FARMER. No. 365P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. Robert Farmer, Pro Se. Harriet F. Worley, Assistant Attorney General, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 630 S.E.2d 244 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of July 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of October 2006."
